data_table.description: Anthropometry, Form ANTA, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ANTA01
variable.description: [Height and weight]. Standing height (to the nearest cm). Q1 [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA02
variable.description: [Height and weight]. Unadjusted sitting height (to the nearest cm). Q2 [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA03
variable.description: [Height and weight]. Stool height (to the nearest cm). Q3 [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA04
variable.description: [Height and weight]. Weight (to the nearest lb). Q4 [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA05A
variable.description: [Skinfolds]. Triceps measure 1 (to the nearest mm). Q5a [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA05B
variable.description: [Skinfolds]. Triceps measure 2 (to the nearest mm). Q5b [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA06A
variable.description: [Skinfolds]. Subscapular measure 1 (to the nearest mm). Q6a [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA06B
variable.description: [Skinfolds]. Subscapular measure 2 (to the nearest mm). Q6b [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA07A
variable.description: [Body size]. Waist girth (to the nearest cm). Q7a [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA07B
variable.description: [Body size]. Hip girth (to the nearest cm). Q7b [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA07C
variable.description: [Body size]. Calf girth (to the nearest cm). Q7c [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: ANTA08
variable.description: [Body size]. Wrist breadth (to the nearest mm). Q8 [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Anthropometry Form, ANTA, exam 1]
